body_html: I think the question fits more on StackOverflow. To use multi-worker training with distribution strategies, you can take a look at our (documentations)[https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/distribute/README.md] and (examples)[https://github.com/tensorflow/ecosystem/tree/master/distribution_strategy].
